title: Disney Villains
description: How well do you know Disney's most wicked characters?

questions.question: Who is the villain in The Little Mermaid?
questions.explanation: Ursula is the sea witch who tricks Ariel into giving up her voice in exchange for human legs!

questions.question: Scar is Simba's uncle in The Lion King.
questions.explanation: Scar is Mufasa's jealous brother who kills him and takes over Pride Rock, exiling young Simba!

questions.question: What does Cruella de Vil want to make from dalmatian puppies?
questions.explanation: The cruel Cruella de Vil wants to kidnap 99 dalmatian puppies to make a spotted fur coat!

questions.question: Who is the villain in Sleeping Beauty?
questions.explanation: Maleficent, the Mistress of All Evil, curses Aurora to prick her finger on a spindle and die before sunset on her 16th birthday!

questions.question: Gaston is the villain in Beauty and the Beast.
questions.explanation: Gaston is the arrogant hunter who wants to marry Belle and leads a mob to kill the Beast!

questions.question: What famous phrase does the Evil Queen say to her Magic Mirror?

options.text: Mirror, mirror on the wall, who's the fairest of them all?
Show me the most beautiful in the land
Mirror, tell me who is prettiest
Who is the queen of beauty?

questions.explanation: The Evil Queen's iconic line as she consults her Magic Mirror about her beauty!

questions.question: Who is Captain Hook's nemesis?
questions.explanation: Captain Hook's arch-enemy is Peter Pan, who cut off his hand and fed it to a crocodile!

questions.question: Jafar turns into a giant snake in Aladdin.
questions.explanation: Jafar uses his sorcerer powers to transform into a giant cobra during his battle with Aladdin!
